sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0354d7c72f4130106a8e2e5df699b6bf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_587269_account_m.calculateNumberOfDays</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>calculateNumberOfDays</name><script><![CDATA[var calculateNumberOfDays = Class.create();
calculateNumberOfDays.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    noOfDays: function(schedule, start_date, end_date) {
        var sd = start_date + ' 00:00:00';
        var ed = end_date + ' 23:59:59';

        var startDate = new GlideDateTime(sd);
        var endDate = new GlideDateTime(ed);
        var sched = new GlideSchedule();

        sched.load(schedule);
        var duration = sched.duration(startDate, endDate);

        var days = duration.getNumericValue() / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 9); //Considering 1 day = 8am to 5pm => 9 hours
		
		return days;
    },

    type: 'calculateNumberOfDays'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-04 15:50:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>0354d7c72f4130106a8e2e5df699b6bf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>calculateNumberOfDays</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Management" source="x_587269_account_m">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Account Management">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0354d7c72f4130106a8e2e5df699b6bf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-04 15:50:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_bb7ae1af2fb030106a8e2e5df699b6f8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_587269_account_m_accounts</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate Total Amount</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    if (current.rate_type == 'daily') {
        current.setValue('total_amount', (current.number_of_working_days * current.amount_per_day));
    }
    if (current.rate_type == 'monthly') {
        current.setValue('total_amount', (current.number_of_months * current.monthly_rate));
    }
    if (current.rate_type == 'fixed') {
        current.setValue('total_amount', current.fixed_amount);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-23 11:11:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bb7ae1af2fb030106a8e2e5df699b6f8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Total Amount</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Account Management" source="x_587269_account_m">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Account Management">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bb7ae1af2fb030106a8e2e5df699b6f8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-29 11:38:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bb7ae1af2fb030106a8e2e5df699b6f8"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8f705b072f4130106a8e2e5df699b608
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_587269_account_m_accounts</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_587269_account_m_accounts">end_dateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Plan Fee Measure</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Code to calculate plan fee amount and store the necessary details by creating a new record in Plan Fee Measure table
    var plan_fee_amount = 0;
    var days = new calculateNumberOfDays().noOfDays(current.getValue('schedule'), current.start_date, current.end_date);

    var pfmGR = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_plan_fee_measure');
    pfmGR.initialize();
    pfmGR.setValue('resource', current.resource);
    pfmGR.setValue('account', current.sys_id);
    pfmGR.setValue('start_date', current.start_date);
    pfmGR.setValue('end_date', current.end_date);

    if (current.rate_type == 'daily') {
        pfmGR.setValue('rate_type', 'daily');
        plan_fee_amount = days * current.amount_per_day;
    }

    if (current.rate_type == 'monthly') {
        pfmGR.setValue('rate_type', 'monthly');
        pfmGR.setValue('number_of_months', current.number_of_months);
        plan_fee_amount = (current.number_of_months) * current.monthly_rate;
    }

    if (current.rate_type == 'fixed') {
        pfmGR.setValue('rate_type', 'fixed');
        plan_fee_amount = current.fixed_amount;
    }

    pfmGR.setValue('plan_fee', plan_fee_amount);
    if (current.operation() == 'update')
        pfmGR.setValue('type', 'extension');
    if (current.operation() == 'insert')
        pfmGR.setValue('type', 'new');
    pfmGR.insert();

    //Code to update Grand Total of all contract records
    if (current.operation() == 'update') {
        var newGrandTotal = parseInt(current.grand_total) + parseInt(plan_fee_amount);
        var accGR = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_accounts');
        accGR.addQuery('account', current.account);
        accGR.query();
        while (accGR.next()) {
            accGR.setValue('grand_total', newGrandTotal);
            accGR.update();
        }
    }

    if (current.operation() == 'insert') {
        var oldGrandTotal = 0;
        var accGR2 = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_accounts');
        accGR2.addQuery('account', current.account);
        accGR2.orderBy('sys_created_on');
        accGR2.query();
        if (accGR2.next()) {
            oldGrandTotal = accGR2.getValue('grand_total');
        }
        var newGrandTotal2 = parseInt(oldGrandTotal) + parseInt(plan_fee_amount);
        var accGR3 = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_accounts');
        accGR3.addQuery('account', current.account);
        accGR3.query();
        while (accGR3.next()) {
            accGR3.setValue('grand_total', newGrandTotal2);
            accGR3.update();
        }
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-04 15:29:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8f705b072f4130106a8e2e5df699b608</sys_id><sys_mod_count>50</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Plan Fee Measure</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Account Management" source="x_587269_account_m">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Account Management">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8f705b072f4130106a8e2e5df699b608</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-08 04:24:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8f705b072f4130106a8e2e5df699b608"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_4a42ef4c2f5930106a8e2e5df699b66c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>TestPFM</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[var arr = [];
var pfmGR = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_plan_fee_measure');
pfmGR.addEncodedQuery('sys_created_onONThis week@javascript:gs.beginningOfThisWeek()@javascript:gs.endOfThisWeek()');
pfmGR.query();
while (pfmGR.next()) {
	var accGR = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_accounts');
	accGR.addQuery('sys_id',pfmGR.account);
	accGR.query();
	if(accGR.next())
		arr.push(accGR.getValue('account_manager'));
    //arr.push(pfmGR.account.account_manager);
}
gs.info(arr.length);
var uniqueArray = new global.ArrayUtil().unique(arr);
gs.info(uniqueArray.length);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-07 19:22:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>4a42ef4c2f5930106a8e2e5df699b66c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TestPFM</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Management" source="x_587269_account_m">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Account Management">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4a42ef4c2f5930106a8e2e5df699b66c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-07 19:29:04</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_sg_write_back_action_item"><sys_sg_write_back_action_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description/><execution_script><![CDATA[(function WriteBackAction(input) {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

    var a = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_accounts');
    a.addQuery('sys_id', input.sys_id);
    a.query();
    if (a.next()) {
        a.account = input.account;
        a.account_manager = input.account_manager;
        //a.resource = input.resource;
        a.platform = input.platform;
        a.designation = input.designation;
        a.schedule = input.schedule;
        a.fixed_amount = input.fixed_amount;
		a.rate_type = input.rate_type;
        a.start_date = input.start_date;
        a.end_date = input.end_date;

        if (a.start_date >= a.end_date) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('End Date should be greater than the Start Date.');
        } else {
            gs.addInfoMessage('Record updated successfully.');
            a.update();
        }
    }

})(input);]]></execution_script><name>Edit (Fixed)</name><parameter_screen/><query_condition/><sys_class_name>sys_sg_write_back_action_item</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-01 02:09:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>58ac70862f4530106a8e2e5df699b68c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Edit (Fixed)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Management" source="x_587269_account_m">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Account Management">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_sg_write_back_action_item_58ac70862f4530106a8e2e5df699b68c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-01 02:09:39</sys_updated_on><table/><template/><type>script</type><use_current_record_as_condition>true</use_current_record_as_condition><use_fields_for_ref_lookup>false</use_fields_for_ref_lookup></sys_sg_write_back_action_item><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=58ac70862f4530106a8e2e5df699b68c"/></record_update>

	// Add your code here
	var endDate = new GlideDate();
	endDate.setValue(current.start_date);
	endDate.addMonthsUTC(parseInt(current.number_of_months));
	//gs.info('Hey '+endDate);
	current.setValue('end_date',endDate);

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_be51b6182f9170106a8e2e5df699b6ff
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_587269_account_m.uniqueAccounts</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>uniqueAccounts</name><script><![CDATA[var uniqueAccounts = Class.create();
uniqueAccounts.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getAccounts: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_accounts');
        gr.addQuery('state', '!=', 'closed');
        gr.query();
        var arr = [];
        while (gr.next()) {
            arr.push(gr.getValue('account'));
        }
        var uniqueArray = new global.ArrayUtil().unique(arr);
        var arr2 = '';
        var count = 0;
        for (var i = 0; i < uniqueArray.length; i++) {
            var gr1 = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_accounts');
            gr1.addQuery('account', uniqueArray[i]);
            gr1.query();
            if (gr1.next()) {
                //arr2.push(gr1.getValue('sys_id'));
                if (count == 0) {
                    arr2 = gr1.getValue('sys_id');
                    count++;
                } else {
                    arr2 += ',' + gr1.getValue('sys_id');
                }
            }
        }
        return arr2;
    },
    type: 'uniqueAccounts'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-08 10:24:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>be51b6182f9170106a8e2e5df699b6ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>uniqueAccounts</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Management" source="x_587269_account_m">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Account Management">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_be51b6182f9170106a8e2e5df699b6ff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-08 11:33:15</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_be1466dc2f5170106a8e2e5df699b654
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_587269_account_m.uniqueAccountss</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>uniqueAccountss</name><script><![CDATA[var uniqueAccountss = Class.create();
uniqueAccountss.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    //All of these conditions must be met

    //Number isoneof javascript:new uniqueAccountss().fcr_exception()
    getAccounts: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_accounts');
        gr.addQuery('state', '!=', 'closed');
        gr.query();
        var arr = [];
        while (gr.next()) {
            arr.push(gr.getValue('account'));
        }
        var uniqueArray = new global.ArrayUtil().unique(arr);
        var arr2 = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < uniqueArray.length; i++) {
            var gr1 = new GlideRecord('x_587269_account_m_accounts');
            gr1.addQuery('account', uniqueArray[i]);
            gr1.query();
            if (gr1.next()) {
                arr2.push(gr1.getValue('sys_id'));
            }
        }
        return arr2.toString();
    },
    type: 'uniqueAccountss'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-08 09:55:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>be1466dc2f5170106a8e2e5df699b654</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>uniqueAccountss</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Management" source="x_587269_account_m">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Account Management">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_be1466dc2f5170106a8e2e5df699b654</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-08 10:23:36</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_76a6228a2f48b0106a8e2e5df699b61c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_587269_account_m_accounts</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_587269_account_m_accounts">start_dateVALCHANGES^ORend_dateVALCHANGES^ORamount_per_dayVALCHANGES^ORscheduleVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="amount_per_day" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="schedule" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Number of Working Days Based on Schedule</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var sched = current.getValue('schedule');
    var s = current.getValue('start_date');
    var e = current.getValue('end_date');

    var sd = s + ' 00:00:00';
    var ed = e + ' 23:59:59';

    var startDate = new GlideDateTime(sd);
    var endDate = new GlideDateTime(ed);
    var schedule = new GlideSchedule();

    schedule.load(sched);
    var duration = schedule.duration(startDate, endDate);
    //gs.info('Sharanya ' + duration.getDurationValue()); // gets the elapsed time in schedule
    //gs.info('Sharanyaaa ' + duration.getNumericValue() / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 9)); //8am-5pm schedule, which is 9 hours. getNumericValue returns duration in milliseconds

    var days = duration.getNumericValue() / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 9);

    current.setValue('number_of_working_days', days);
    //current.setValue('total_amount', days * current.amount_per_day);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-05-12 16:53:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>76a6228a2f48b0106a8e2e5df699b61c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Number of Working Days Based on Schedule</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Account Management" source="x_587269_account_m">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Account Management">e43c1e972f6720106a8e2e5df699b612</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_76a6228a2f48b0106a8e2e5df699b61c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-23 11:02:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=76a6228a2f48b0106a8e2e5df699b61c"/></record_update>
